00024 #define CS_MODE_COMMAND  0

00027 // These must all be negative numbers, as they are mingled with
00028 // the number of bytes read in the ReadLine() return code.
00029 enum COMFILE_STATE
00030 {
00031      COMFILE_ERROR   = -2
00032    , COMFILE_EOF     = -1
00033    , COMFILE_GOOD    =  0
00034 };
